addr: Ken Barrington Cricket Centre . Kennington. , Greater London SE11 5SS GB
title: U13 Lady Taverners - Inner London Competition
desc: As part of Surrey Cricket?s extensive schools competition programme we would like to invite you to participate in the above competition. The Lady Taverners Competition is a girl?s indoor soft cricket ball competition and is held for U13 girls. The competition is 8-a-side, although schools are encouraged to bring a squad for the day as changes to the team are permitted after each game.  The game is designed to be fun, fast, exciting and is designed to show girls that cricket is a sport they can get involved in to develop their skills and enjoy the team competition against other schools in their area. Rules for the competition can be found below. The overall winner of the area competition will advance to the county finals day which will be held at Ashcombe School on 15th March 2016. Lady Taverners Indoor U13 and U15 Rules  Team:  8-a-side (Must be under 13 or younger as at 1 st  September 2015) Match:  8 overs per side with a max of 2 overs per bowler Rules: Points: We look forward to receiving your entry.?? Kind Regards Mark 0207 820 4195 mababb@surreycricket.com
